thread.section_title: Brian Gavin Diamonds Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brian Gavin Diamonds | briangavindiamonds.com
thread.title: Nina E
thread.title_full: Brian Gavin Diamonds reviewed by Nina E

author: Nina E
title: Nina E
text:
Working with Brian was an amazing experience. During the holidays a ring I had worn for 20 years was damaged beyond repair. As I looked buy a new center diamond and have the ring recreated I knew exactly to whom I would turn. I had purchased a diamond from Brian Gavin previously and knew he was the only person I could trust to have the project turn out perfectly. And the result is a ring that is truly stunning.
Brian was so patient with me during the entire process. Kudos go out to Emily and Lesley as well for their support and patience. You absolutely cannot ask for better communication than what you get when you work with Brian and his team.
